If the cryptography code takes in multiple SRSs, then it will need to handle running them in parallel also. It may also mean that the cryptography code _could_ return null, if the javascript code gave it the same randomness.

content:
<vbuterin> Possible fixes that come to mind:

* Recommend that users turn on airplane mode when running the ceremony. When they're done, auto-download a text file. They can then close the tab, reopen it, and upload the text file.
* Let users generate their own key, either by typing stuff into a textbox or by drawing a shape, which gets downloaded and the hash of which becomes the key
